abstract: Federal Aviation Administration proposes record $1.9 million fine against SkyPan International for flying camera drones in crowded airspaces without permission.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Aviation Administration proposed a record $1.9 million fine against SkyPan International for flying drones in New York and Chicago without permission.

headline.main: F.A.A. Proposes Big Fine for Drone Violations
headline.print_headline: F.A.A. Proposes Big Fine for Drone Violations

snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration proposed a record $1.9 million fine against SkyPan International for flying drones in New York and Chicago without permission.
